client_id.title: ClientID
client_id.description: Your Plaid API `client_id`. The `client_id` is required and may be provided either in the `PLAID-CLIENT-ID` header or as part of a request body.

secret.title: APISecret
secret.description: Your Plaid API `secret`. The `secret` is required and may be provided either in the `PLAID-SECRET` header or as part of a request body.

origination_account_id.description: If multiple origination accounts are available, `origination_account_id` must be used to specify the account that the sweeps belong to.

start_time.description: The start datetime of sweeps to return (RFC 3339 format).

end_time.description: The end datetime of sweeps to return (RFC 3339 format).

count.description: The maximum number of sweeps to return.
